ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was financially supported by JSPS Grant-in-aid for Encouragement of Young Scientist (Grant Number JP16K16233). We acknowledge the Kinu-aqua station for kindly providing the activated sludge. We also appreciate the contribution of Yumiko Kayashima, Akemi Katayama, Maki Yanagisawa and Kazuyuki Matsuo (National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST)) for the operation of the MBR-RO system.
